Wendy: s added self-serve kiosks at around thirty restaurants in 2016.
The implementation of self: serve kiosks was not due to a minimum wage hike.
The claim was based on a meme posted by: a conservative nonprofit group, featuring a photograph of self-serve kiosks at a Wendy's restaurant.
The increase in the minimum wage has not: s, as the minimum wage hikes in various cities and states are still in the process of being implemented.
